raw_text: We evaluated the alignment performance of the proposed models with two tasks: Japanese English word alignment with the Basic Travel Expression Corpus (BTEC) (Takezawa et al, 2002) and French-English word alignment with the Hansard dataset (Hansards) from the 2003 NAACL shared task (Mihalcea and Pedersen, 2003)
clean_text: We evaluated the alignment performance of the proposed models with two tasks: Japanese English word alignment with the Basic Travel Expression Corpus (BTEC) (Takezawa et al, 2002) and French-English word alignment with the Hansard dataset (Hansards) from the 2003 NAACL shared task (Mihalcea and Pedersen, 2003).
